1. Create the operator1 user: -> sudo useradd -m operator1
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/797952bf-e3c0-4a03-99df-88a39e025260)

2. Confirm that operator1 exists: -> cat /etc/passwd | grep operator1
